content: आशास्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be obtained by a boon. {@--2@} To be blessed; <ls>Mv. 4. 13.</ls> {@--3@} To be wished for, desirable; अनाशास्यजयो ययौ <ls>R. 4. 44</ls> (who had not to {%wish for%} {%victory%}, to whom victory came unsought). --स्यं {@--1@} A thing to be wished for, wish, desire; संपन्नास्ते सर्वाशिषः <ls>Mu. 7</ls>; <ls>M. 5. 20.</ls> {@--2@} A blessing, benediction; आशास्यचिंतास्तिमितो बभूव <ls>Ku. 7. 87</ls>; आशास्यमन्यत् पुनरुक्तभूतं <ls>R. 5. 34.</ls>
